item.title: 100,000 health workers will be hired to improve healthcare: State minister
item.description: The government will soon recruit 100,000 health workers to improve the quality of healthcare across the country, State Minister for Health and Family Welfare MA Muhit has said. During a visit to the Sirajganj 250-bed General Hospital on Thursday afternoon, he emphasised that the health sector has

item.title: Poet Mohon Raihan selected, but not awarded
item.description: Without warning or explanation, the Bangla Academy has left poet Mohon Raihan empty-handed at the Amar Ekushey Book Fair, withholding the literature award for which he had been selected. The poet left the ceremony bewildered, alleging that a decades-old poem about Colonel Taher had barred him from

item.title: Iran promises flexibility at nuclear talks amid threat of US strikes
item.description: Iran pledged to show flexibility at indirect talks with the United States on their longstanding nuclear dispute on Thursday, with Tehran under pressure to agree to a deal or face US military strikes. The third round of talks in Geneva, which began on Thursday morning, will discuss Iran's nuclear p

item.title: Finance minister declines to comment on Mansur’s departure from BB
item.description: Finance Minister Amir Khosru Mahmud Chowdhury has declined to comment on the departure of economist Ahsan H Mansur from Bangladesh Bank, which was marked by protests and agitation. Asked on Thursday whether the manner of the governor’s exit was “right”, the minister repeatedly sa

item.title: Yunus likely to vacate Jamuna on Saturday
item.description: The now-dissolved interim government’s chief adviser, Muhammad Yunus, is expected to vacate the State Guest House Jamuna on Saturday. Public Works Department Chief Engineer Md Khalekuzzaman Chowdhury said the Jamuna would be vacated on Saturday afternoon, according to bdnews24.com. After ta

item.title: UCB opens new branch in Daganbhuiyan
item.description: United Commercial Bank PLC (UCB), as part of its ongoing initiative to expand banking services across the country, has inaugurated a new branch in Daganbhuiyan, Feni. According to a press release, the branch has been launched with the aim of delivering modern, fast, and reliable banking services t

item.title: 405th board meeting of Shahjalal Islami Bank held
item.description: The 405th meeting of the Board of Directors of Shahjalal Islami Bank PLC was held on Wednesday at the Corporate Head Office of the bank. The meeting was presided over by Chairman Mr. Mohammed Younus. The board approved a number of investment proposals, according to a press release. Among others t

item.title: EC revises referendum results, cuts both ‘Yes’ and ‘No’ votes
item.description: The Election Commission (EC) has brought a major revision to the results of the referendum held to implement the July National Charter (constitutional reform), reducing both ‘Yes’ and ‘No’ votes compared to the previously announced figures. The revised information was publi

item.title: Pubali Bank holds 200th meeting of Executive Risk Management Committee
item.description: The 200th Meeting of the Executive Risk Management Committee (ERMC) of Pubali Bank PLC was held recently through a virtual platform, according to a press release. Managing Director & CEO Mohammad Ali attended the meeting as Chief Guest and Deputy Managing Directors- Ahmed Enayet Manzur, Md. Shahne

item.title: 'LPG market monitoring to be intensified to ease consumers' hassle'
item.description: Commerce Minister Khandaker Abdul Muktadir today (Thursday) said the government will strengthen Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG) market monitoring through local administrations to ensure that consumers do not face harassment and that no one can engage in market abuse at the retail level. The minister

item.title: Girl abducted, found dead after family seeks justice over rape
item.description: A 15-year-old girl was abducted from her father and later found dead in Narsingdi after her family sought justice over her rape, police, relatives and locals said. Her body was found in a mustard field between Bilpar and Darikandi in Mahishashura Union of Sadar Upazila on Thursday, Prothom Alo rep

item.title: NRBC Bank observes ‘Remittance Service Month’ during Holy Ramadan
item.description: NRBC Bank PLC is observing the holy month of Ramadan as a ‘Special Remittance Service Month’ to encourage expatriates to send remittances through formal banking channels and to further expand related services, according to a press release.
